name: TerraformOutput
description: Load Terraform Plan Markdown Output into Terraform Tab
author: Frank van Eykelen

inputs.name: useGlobPattern
inputs.label: Use Glob Pattern Search
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true, the artifact name will be inferred from the filename.

inputs.name: outputFilePattern
inputs.label: Output File Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path Pattern used to find output files.

inputs.name: searchDirectory
inputs.label: Search Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory to search for Terraform Plan output files. The default value is $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)

inputs.name: inferArtifactName
inputs.label: Infer Artifact Name from Filename
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true, the artifact name will be inferred from the filename.

inputs.name: outputFilePath
inputs.label: Output File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory of the Terraform Plan output file. The default value is $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)/output.tfplan

inputs.name: artifactName
inputs.label: Artifact Distinguishing Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the artifact visible in the select window.
